function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social distancing and hoarding of essential items","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 and shortage of essential products","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing regulations, education on responsible purchasing","Technologies":"Blockchain for tracking and reporting violations","People":"General public, volunteers","Owner":"Government, local authorities"},{"Description":"Fraudulent bank accounts and relief funds","Impact":"Loss of trust in donation platforms, financial losses for donors","Mitigation":"Verification processes for donation platforms, transparency in fund management","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparent donation tracking","People":"Donors, charitable organizations","Owner":"Government, charitable organizations"}]}
